item.title: Bluetooth Connection Issues
item.description: Q: I have tried to connect the Cypress CySmart software to the USB dongle but it does not work. Help!

item.title: PSoC 4 Hardware Development Kits
item.description: There are several Cypress Programmable System on a Chip (PSoCÂ®) hardware development kits available for use in designs. The list below describes strengths of each kit and provides links to documentation.
